item.title: How to Instantly Stop Emergency SOS from Accidentally Activating on iPhone 14!
item.description: How to Instantly Stop Emergency SOS from Accidentally Activating on iPhone 14 The Emergency SOS feature on the latest iPhone 14 is a great way to instantly call for help in an emergency. But, unfortunately, this feature can also be accidentally activated if you press the power button five times in a row. To prevent this from happening, here’s how to quickly disable Emergency SOS from activating on your iPhone 14.
